And my success is <only> with God, in Him do I trust and to Him shall I return. Praise be to God. I ask him for mercy from his side, and our success. Mon assistance n’est qu’en Dieu. Sur Lui je m’appuie et vers Lui je reviens repentant. Louange à Dieu! Je Lui demande miséricorde de Sa part et assistance.
Enregistré. It has been confirmed.
Au nom de Dieu, clément et miséricordieux! In the name of God, the Compassionate and Merciful. She bought in Egypt,
Fāṭima bt. Naṣr, the barber-surgeon (?), from ʾAḥmad b. ʿImrān, the miller, Fāṭima ibnat Naṣr al-Munǧiḥ a acheté à Miṣr d’Aḥmad b. ʿImrān le meunieur,
habitant du Mawqif au (quartier des) meuniers, une esclave qui se trouve en sa possession et reconnaît être living in the place (?), with the millers, (she bought) a female slave in his house, acknowledged to belong to him
as his property, who is called Tawfīq [...], black to red, straight sa propriété, appelée Tawfīq. C’est une Garamente noire tirant sur le rouge et
and heavy of build, having a sloping forehead, bright and large eyes, flat-nosed, with thick de taille moyenne. Elle a les cheveux du toupet frisés, un front proéminent, des sourcils écartés, de grands yeux, un nez camard,
des lèvres épaisses, dont l’inférieure est percée, un menton court et brisé. lips, the upper of them pierced, short, and (her) chin is cleft.
Le prix est de vingt-cinq dinars d’al-Muʿizz, rémunération forfaitaire comprise. Les parties ont pris possesion réciproquement (l’une du prix, l’autre de l’esclave) The price is twenty-five Muʿizzī Dīnārs, the reward for her (?). The received from each other (the money and the slave respectively)
and separated from each other in mutual satisfaction. (They transacted this?) as an islamic sale with its contractual obligation, its authority et se sont séparées sur consentement mutuel. Vente (conclue suivant la loi) de l’ilsam et sa garantie. (L’esclave) est en bonne santé
and its security. The seller became free from the swelling of her body and feet, the white-hairedness et exemple (de tromperie). Le vendeur a libéré sa responsabilité de la laideur de ses mains et de ses pieds, de ses cheveux blancs
et de ses dents arrachées. Et cela le jour du jeudi huit of hear head and the putridity of her molar teeth. And this (took place) on Thursday, eight (nights)
du mois de rabīʿ I l’ammée trois cent soixante-sept. having past of the month of Rabīʿ I, in the year nine-and-sixty and three hundred.
Ont témoigné de cela Aḥmad b. Saʿd al-Maʿnī, ʿAlī b. al-Ġarīb, Witnessed by ʾAḥmad b. Saʿd the singer, ʿAlī son of the stranger,
Maymūn b. Naṣr le maître d’école, Mūsā b. Isḥāq le joaillier, Maymūn b. Naṣr the educator, Mūsā b. ʾIsḥaq, the jewel-trader,
Ḥaǧǧāǧ b. Aḥmad, Ḫalaf b. Ḥalfūn et ʿAlī b. Bišr al-Ṣafadī. Ḥaǧǧāǧ b. ʾAḥmad, Ḫalaf b. Ḫalqūn and ʿAlī son of the jewel-trader.
